title: lvl 40 no reward?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
Ive just reached level 40 about 20 minutes ago, and I have not received a reward like all of the other levels (champion capsule, etc).. is there a reason to this? I did not see the level up page either. I dont know what i did wrong, please help!


update: 3 hours later and still hasnt come into my inventory? please help!

replies.body:
Straaaaange things are happening. No worries though, luckily this is easy enough for me to check and I've got that level 40 milestone capsule added for you! 

If this does happen again, please reach out to our game team in a ticket asap so we can track this kind of issue and figure out exactly what causes it!

so i just finished a game today, and it displayed the notification that i had received the two capsules i hadnt gotten. however, when i went to check my loot, i found nothing there. i restarted the client several times to no avail.
im also having this problem. i also hit level 41 and gained no reward
I ran into the same problem, and I never got mine at level 40.

Hello everyone! my last update is I have gotten the capsule in my inventory randomly a day later. You guys should all check your loot and you might have recieved yours too, if not, just wait a little longer and your problem should be solved. Thanks! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Same here. Hit LVL 40, and received no capsule.
I just hit 40 same issue here
Same, reported as a bug. I just hope we all get the reward after they fix.
same i dont know if it was cus i finished another quest or not
